job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsYou have solid C/C++ coding abilities.
• Python experience is a plusYou have proven excellence in firmware, device driver, or equivalent for experienced candidatesYou have strong analytical and software debugging skillsYou have a passion for product ownership and track record of product developmentYou thrive in collaborative environment with excellent written and verbal communication skillsYou have a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience.
